What is (are) High Blood Cholesterol ?,"Cholesterol is a waxy, fat-like substance that your liver makes. It is also found in some foods that come from animals.",NIHSeniorHealth,High Blood Cholesterol
What is (are) High Blood Cholesterol ?,"LDL stands for low-density lipoproteins. (Lipoproteins are molecules that carry cholesterol through your bloodstream.) LDL cholesterol is sometimes called bad cholesterol because it can build up in the
